TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Suriname, title = Suriname, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suriname} }

S.FORM: Suriname Itini i 4 00 N, 56 00 W, noNotimolan Amilika ko Suriname. Polong no sekalay i 163,820 sq km "saka 92 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 156,000 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 7,820 sq km " Polong i 585,824 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 0.50%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 94.60%, malo no roma to a sera 4.90%. siyoto O (((Paramaribo)) ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay ko safaw 25 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Dési Bouterse, patirengan a romi'ad i 2010 a miheca saka 8 folad saka 12 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部

Soriname Itini i 4 00 N, 56 00 W, noNotimolan Amilika ko Soriname. Polong no sekalay i 163,820 sq km "saka 92 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 156,000 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 7,820 sq km " Polong i 585,824 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 0.50%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 94.60%, malo no roma to a sera 4.90%. siyoto O (((Paramaribo)) ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay ko safaw 25 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Dési Booterse, patirengan a romi'ad i 2010 a miheca saka 8 folad saka 12 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部
